# Sub-Issue Template

For individual tasks within an epic.

## Template

```markdown
## Description

{{description}}

## Files to Modify

{{#each files}}
- `{{this.path}}` - {{this.action}}
{{/each}}

## Implementation Notes

{{notes}}

## Verification

| Type | Details | Expected |
|------|---------|----------|
{{#each verification}}
| {{this.type}} | {{this.details}} | {{this.expected}} |
{{/each}}

## Checklist

- [ ] Implementation complete
- [ ] Tests written/updated
- [ ] Verification passing
- [ ] Ready for review

## Parent Epic

Contributes to #{{epic_number}}

---
*Generated by fyrsmithlabs github-planning*
```

## Usage

```bash
gh issue create \
  --title "{{title}}" \
  --label "task" \
  --body "<populated template>"
```

## Field Mapping

| Field | Source |
|-------|--------|
| `description` | Task description from design |
| `files` | Files identified during design |
| `notes` | Implementation guidance |
| `verification` | Auto-generated for this task |
| `epic_number` | Parent epic issue number |

## Closing Behavior

When sub-issue is closed:
1. Parent epic checkbox should be checked
2. If all sub-issues closed, epic can be closed
3. PR should reference: "Closes #<sub-issue>"
